titleStmt.title: Maximum in minimo, or, Mr. Jeremiah Rich's Pen's dexterity compleated being the plainest and easiest method of writing shorthand ... / by Samuel Botley.
titleStmt.author: Botley, Samuel, 1642-1696?
Rich, Jeremiah, d. 1660? Pen's dexterity compleated.

notesStmt.note: Manuscript foliation, alternating two blank pages with two pages of text.
"The whole curiously engrav'd on thirty copper plates."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
